UMBC COEIT Copy/Paste Tool Clause Selector

Select the clauses you want to include in your document.

Introduction Paragraph C/P Course Recommendations Paragraph C/P Repeat Policy Blurb Language Requirement Blurb CSEE Track Blurb Last Paragraph Generate Document GENERATED ADVISOR GUIDE

Select topics from the left panel and click "Generate Document" to create advisor guide content.
